column6: • Their joyous reunion actually a little less “joyous” and a little more “How about I reunite my fist with your ear,” Angela and Sera meet face to face at last! • To rescue her beloved, Angela learns that she cannot steal Sera from Hel--she must conquer Hel, and rewrite the laws as old as death to free them both from the abyss!
column8: | writer:Marguerite Bennett | penciller (cover):Stephanie Hans | artist:Aaron Kim Jacinto
